About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Hi! My name is Ricardo. I am from Albuquerque, NM. Currently, I am attending Dartmouth College with a major in Electrical and Computer Engineering. I have been programming for 6 years. The first programming language that I learned was C, which I learned in my highschool robotics club. In college I expanded on what I had learned in highschool and have since become a C-Programming TA. This summer I will be working on developing the embedded systems course at Dartmouth.
